alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 3:08AM MST until February 22 at 10:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin and Upper Gunnison River Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 10 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley
